definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Organize supervision and verification of the on-site quality control activities by supplier.
sentences.chinese: 供應商現場質量管理的監控和檢證。

sentences.english: This paper examines the relationship between democracy and effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 本文試圖檢證民主與效能之間的關係。
